verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to the crown<WH5850> of pride<WH1348> of the drunkards<WH7910> of Ephraim,<WH669> and to the fading<WH5034> flower<WH6731> of his glorious<WH6643> beauty,<WH8597> which is on the head<WH7218> of the fertile<WH8081> valley<WH1516> of those who are overcome<WH1986> with wine!<WH3196>

The crown<WH5850> of pride<WH1348> of the drunkards<WH7910> of Ephraim<WH669> will be trodden<WH7429> under foot.<WH7272>

The fading<WH5034> flower<WH6733> of his glorious<WH6643> beauty,<WH8597> which is on the head<WH7218> of the fertile<WH8081> valley,<WH1516> shall be like the first-ripe<WH1061> fig before the summer;<WH7019> which someone picks<WH3709> and eats<WH1104> as soon<WH7200> as he sees it.<WH7200>
In that day,<WH3117> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> will become a crown<WH5850> of glory,<WH6643> and a diadem<WH6843> of beauty,<WH8597> to the residue<WH7605> of his people;<WH5971>
and a spirit<WH7307> of justice<WH4941> to him who sits<WH3427> in judgment,<WH4941> and strength<WH1369> to those who turn<WH7725> back the battle<WH4421> at the gate.<WH8179>

They<WH428> also reel<WH7686> with wine,<WH3196> and stagger<WH8582> with strong drink.<WH7941> The priest<WH3548> and the prophet<WH5030> reel<WH7686> with strong drink.<WH7941> They are swallowed up<WH1104> by<WH4480> wine.<WH3196> They stagger<WH8582> with strong drink.<WH7941> They err<WH7686> in vision.<WH7203> They stumble<WH6328> in judgment.<WH6417>
For all tables<WH7979> are completely full<WH4390> of filthy<WH4725> vomit<WH6892> and filthiness.<WH6675>
Whom will he teach<WH3384> knowledge?<WH1844> To whom will he explain<WH995> the message?<WH8052> Those who are weaned<WH1580> from the milk,<WH2461> and drawn<WH6267> from the breasts?<WH7699>
For it is precept<WH6673> on precept,<WH6673> precept<WH6673> on precept;<WH6673> line<WH6957> on line,<WH6957> line<WH6957> on line;<WH6957> here a little,<WH2191> there a little.<WH2191>
But he will speak<WH1696> to this nation<WH5971> with stammering<WH3934> lips<WH8193> and in another<WH312> language;<WH3956>
to whom he said,<WH559> "This is the resting<WH5117> place.<WH4496> Give rest to weary;<WH5889>" and<WH4774> "This is the refreshing;" yet they would<WH14> not hear.<WH8085>

Therefore the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> will be to them precept<WH6673> on precept,<WH6673> precept<WH6673> on precept;<WH6673> line<WH6957> on line,<WH6957> line<WH6957> on line;<WH6957> here a little,<WH2191> there a little;<WH2191> that they may go,<WH3212> fall<WH3782> backward,<WH268> be broken,<WH7665> be snared,<WH3369> and be taken.<WH3920>
Therefore hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> you<WH582> scoffers,<WH3944> that rule<WH4910> this people<WH582> in Jerusalem:<WH3389>

"Because you have said,<WH559> <WH3772> 'We have made a covenant<WH1285> with death,<WH4194> and with Sheol<WH7585> are we<WH6213> in agreement.<WH2374> When the overflowing<WH7857> scourge<WH7752> passes through,<WH5674> it won't<WH935> come to us;<WH7760> for we have made lies<WH3577> our refuge,<WH4268> and we have hidden<WH5641> ourselves under falsehood.<WH8267>'"

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> "Behold,<WH3245> I lay in Zion<WH6726> for a foundation a stone,<WH68> a tried<WH976> stone,<WH68> a precious<WH3368> cornerstone<WH6438> of a sure<WH3245> foundation.<WH4143> He who believes<WH539> shall not act hastily.<WH2363>

I will make<WH7760> justice<WH4941> the measuring line,<WH6957> and righteousness<WH6666> the plumb<WH4949> line.<WH1259> The hail will sweep away<WH3261> the refuge<WH4268> of lies,<WH3577> and the waters<WH4325> will overflow<WH7857> the hiding place.<WH5643>

Your covenant<WH1285> with death<WH4194> shall be annulled,<WH3722> and your agreement<WH2380> with Sheol<WH7585> shall not stand.<WH6965> When the overflowing<WH7857> scourge<WH7752> passes through,<WH5674> then you will be trampled down by it.<WH4823>

As often<WH1767> as it passes through,<WH5674> it will seize<WH3947> you;<WH1242> for morning by morning<WH1242> it will pass through,<WH5674> by day<WH3117> and by night;<WH3915> and it will be nothing but terror<WH2113> to understand<WH995> the message.<WH8052>"
For the bed<WH4702> is too short<WH7114> to stretch<WH8311> out on,<WH4541> and the blanket is too narrow<WH6887> to wrap oneself in.<WH3664>

For Yahweh<WH3068> will rise up<WH6965> as on Mount<WH2022> Perazim.<WH6559> He will be angry<WH7264> as in the valley<WH6010> of Gibeon;<WH1391> that he may do<WH6213> his work,<WH4639> his unusual<WH2114> work,<WH4639> and bring to pass<WH5647> his act,<WH5656> his extraordinary<WH5237> act.<WH5656>

Now therefore don't<WH3887> be scoffers, lest your bonds<WH4147> be made strong;<WH2388> for I have heard<WH8085> a decree<WH2782> of destruction<WH3617> from the Lord,<WH136> Yahweh<WH136> of Armies,<WH6635> on the whole earth.<WH776>
Give ear,<WH238> and hear<WH8085> my voice!<WH6963> Listen,<WH7181> and hear<WH8085> my speech!<WH565>
Does he who plows<WH2790> to sow<WH2232> plow<WH2790> continually?<WH3117> Does he keep turning<WH6605> the soil<WH127> and breaking the clods?<WH7702>

When he has leveled<WH7737> its surface,<WH6440> doesn't<WH6327> he plant the dill,<WH7100> and scatter<WH2236> the cumin<WH3646> seed,<WH7760> and put in the wheat<WH2406> in rows,<WH7795> the barley<WH8184> in the appointed<WH5567> place,<WH3698> and the spelt in its place?<WH1367>
For his God<WH430> instructs<WH3256> him in right judgment,<WH4941> and teaches him.<WH3384>

For the dill<WH7100> are not threshed<WH1758> with a sharp instrument,<WH2742> neither is a cart<WH5699> wheel<WH212> turned over<WH5437> the cumin;<WH3646> but the dill<WH7100> is beaten out<WH2251> with a stick,<WH4294> and the cumin<WH3646> with a rod.<WH7626>

Bread<WH3899> flour must be ground;<WH1854> so he will not always<WH5331> be threshing<WH156> it.<WH1536> Although he drives the wheel of his threshing cart<WH5699> over<WH2000> it,<WH6571> his horses don't<WH1854> grind it.
This also comes forth<WH3318> from Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> who is wonderful<WH6381> in counsel,<WH6098> and excellent<WH1431> in wisdom.<WH8454>
